staxel.village.dialogue.Tutorial.line:10: You're a new face - we don't get many of those around here!
(검수필요) You must be ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
On behalf of all of us here in ^c:1486b0;Staxel^c:pop;, welcome!
I'm ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; by the way!
I've been sent to make sure you know how to take care of the farm properly!
That was you right? The one taking over the old farm?
Yup, that's me!
No...
Nice to see you again!
Doing well?
No? Hmm... are you sure about that?
Oh well, I guess this must be a pleasant surprise then?
Excellent! Just as I thought!
Glad to hear it!
First, I'll take you on a brief tour of the village.
Then we'll head over to the farm.
Hopefully it'll quickly start to feel familiar!
Oh, and if you manage to get lost, you can check your map anytime!
Follow me!
This is the local ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop;.
It's a pretty nice place to hang out after a long day of work!
^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop;, the owner, can be a good source of local rumours.
You should head on in and talk to him - I think he has something for you!
I'll be waiting right here.
Ready to move on?
Yes, lead the way!
Not quite yet.
Next up, let's head to the ^c:1486b0;supermarket^c:pop;!
Follow me!
The ^c:1486b0;supermarket^c:pop; sells many of the items you'll need on a daily basis.
There's things like pet ^c:d03e37;food^c:pop;, ^c:d03e37;seeds^c:pop;, ^c:d03e37;tools^c:pop;, and other handy items!
While you were busy chatting with ^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop; I popped over to the merchants.
They're just on the other side of the ^c:1486b0;town square^c:pop;.
They don't just sell wares, they'll buy things off you too!
You just need to place the item on the sell spot and click it.
Those ^c:d03e37;seeds^c:pop; should come in handy I think!
We'll need to head to the farm so that you can actually make use of them though!
This might be a good time to memorise the path to and from the village!
It's this way!
So here it is - your new home!
It might be a bit daunting at first, but you'll settle in.
You're a little ways outside the village compared to the rest of us.
Hopefully your pet should keep you from feeling too lonely once it arrives!
If not, we're just down the road and always happy to chat.
Perhaps we should start by heading out to the fields?
Follow me!
You can ^c:d03e37;hoe^c:pop; grass to create tilled soil to plant ^c:d03e37;seeds^c:pop;.
If you ^c:d03e37;hold down the button^c:pop;, you can ^c:d03e37;charge^c:pop; to till a larger area!
Give it a shot and plant the ^c:d03e37;seeds^c:pop; I gave you earlier.
If you lost them, you can buy some more from one of the merchants!
Have you planted any ^c:d03e37;seeds^c:pop; yet?
I gave you some earlier, remember?
The merchants in the ^c:1486b0;square^c:pop; sell them otherwise!
Good job!
Here's a little something to celebrate your success!
You can use the ^c:d03e37;watering can^c:pop; to water your crops.
If you don't water them every day, they'll start to wither.
Withered crops won't grow!
Go on, give it a shot!
Looks like you've got the hang of it!
Here, another reward.
Hmm...
I think it's going to take quite a while for the crop to grow...
In fact, I'm already starting to feel a bit thirsty!
Could you take this note to ^c:1486b0;{0-bar_name}^c:pop; and bring me back something to drink?
Might be good to see if he has any tasks for you while you're at it!
I'll be waiting right here when you get back!
Still not done helping ^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop; out?
I'm getting thirstier by the minute!
Those plants don't look very wet to me...
Hm? So where's my ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop;?
You don't have it?!
^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop; assured you that this was all you needed?!
Oh.
By the way... is... is that ^c:d03e37;letter^c:pop; for me?
Let me just take it off you.
Well now... he didn't have to be so blunt about it.
Oh well. Nothing for it I guess...
You're lucky I'm a kind-hearted person or I might have withheld your pet in retaliation!
There you go!
I suppose I should teach you how to properly place the ^c:d03e37;pet house^c:pop; too!
A ^c:d03e37;hammer^c:pop; might be useful here just in case you place it incorrectly and want to adjust!
You can place the ^c:d03e37;pet house^c:pop; in a similar way to using a tool.
If you ^c:d03e37;hold down the button^c:pop;, you can ^c:d03e37;rotate^c:pop; to get it to face the way you want before placing!
Go on, try it out!
Ah! Good job!
Are you sure you're happy with that rotation?
Remember, if you change your mind, you can use the ^c:d03e37;hammer^c:pop; to break it!
The pet will be safely stored until you place it again!
If you ^c:d03e37;hold down the button while placing^c:pop;, you can ^c:d03e37;rotate^c:pop; it first!
Well? What are you waiting for?
Go ahead and place your ^c:d03e37;pet house^c:pop; so you can meet your new pet!
^c:d03e37;Holding down the button^c:pop; during placement will let you ^c:d03e37;rotate^c:pop; it just right!
Your pet is going to get hungry pretty quickly by the way.
Hmm? Who might you be?
I think it might be a good idea to stock up on some ^c:d03e37;pet food^c:pop; when you can.
(검수필요) ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop; you say?
The ^c:1486b0;supermarket^c:pop; sells many of the things you need for everyday life.
Let me see... doesn't look like you're on my list!
I'd check there.
I'm guessing you're a friend of the farm's new owner?
For now, you can place the ^c:d03e37;bowl^c:pop; you got earlier and fill that.
Welcome to the village! I hope you enjoy your stay!
Still here?
(검수필요) Well I guess I could give you a small welcome package...
Just don't go telling anyone about this...
Let me know once it's done!
Great! Now your pet should be good for a while!
Hmm...
You know what? I'm tired of waiting on that crop...
I want to see a ^c:d03e37;bowl^c:pop; filled to the brim with ^c:d03e37;pet food^c:pop;.
The ^c:1486b0;supermarket^c:pop; should sell them.
I imagine you're also getting a bit tired of looking at me by now.
You see that ^c:d03e37;jar of water^c:pop; I just gave you?
This is no standard tap water!
^c:d03e37;Magic Water^c:pop; will grow any crop instantly! Cool huh?
Some merchants might sell it so keep an eye out. It's pretty rare and expensive though!
Pour it over that crop you just planted and get to harvesting!
You did it! Not as hard as it sounds is it?
The time has finally come to give you your ^c:d03e37;Farm Registration Letter^c:pop;!
You should head to the ^c:1486b0;town hall^c:pop; to file it with ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; as soon as possible.
In exchange you'll get a special package to help jump start your farm!
As for me, I think it's about time I get out of your way.
You can always look me up in town!
Good luck!
It doesn't look like you've harvested the crop yet.
Pour ^c:d03e37;Magic Water^c:pop; on crop. Pick crop. Easy!
(검수필요) Hi ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
It looks like you've achieved some interesting new feats!
These are from the town to commemorate the occasion!
Don't forget to visit me again next time!
So are you ready to learn a bit about farming?
I can show you around the village and evaluate your skills.
We need to make sure you know what you're doing!
Then we can give you a ^c:d03e37;farming license^c:pop;!
Sound good?
Sounds perfect!
I think I'll pass.
Oh... you don't think you need the help?
Not interested in the subtleties of farming?
Are you absolutely sure?
Positive.
Actually...
Oh.
Well if that's how you want to play it.
Don't expect any help with your farm then!
Without your ^c:d03e37;license^c:pop; you won't be able to fully restore it.
I doubt the mayor will support you either.
We had a nice little companion to give you too...
Oh well. Your loss.
Come grovel if you ever change your mind.
Oh. You again.
Have you realised your mistake?
Come back to beg for your ^c:d03e37;license^c:pop;?
If you've changed your mind I might just forgive you...
I've changed my mind.
Nope, not interested.
Then what are you here for?
Come back when you're ready to grovel!
I'm already a licensed farmer.
Oh, really? That's encouraging!
You'll need a ^w:i;local^w:clear; license, but I see you already have your ^c:d03e37;Farm Registration Letter^c:pop; prepared for that!
Don't forget to run it over to ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; at the ^c:1486b0;town hall^c:pop;!
There's still a barn waiting to be built!
Oh, right, I have a pet for you too! Which one did you want?
I'll take the cat!
I'll take the dog!
There you go! Good luck with the farm!
(안함)^c:1486b0;Butterflies^c:pop;? I'm really more into the farming side of things...
(안함)But I guess I've seen ^c:1486b0;blue butterflies^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;pink butterflies^c:pop;...
(안함)^c:1486b0;Purple butterflies^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;white butterflies^c:pop;...oh, ^c:1486b0;yellow butterflies^c:pop; too.
(안함)Does that answer your question?
(안함)^c:1486b0;Rowan's^c:pop; looking for a part-time helper, is he?
(안함)Do you think he'd let me drink as much ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop; as I want on the job?
(안함)Tell him I'm on board if he will!
(안함)Oh, I remember this. I think I gave ^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop; this ^c:d03e37;broom^c:pop; for one of his birthdays...
(안함)I see he's managed to make you into his lackey!
(안함)I was hoping to do that first...
(안함)Here to participate in the harvest festival? Let me just give you a quick rundown of the rules!
(안함)This is a produce-growing competition! Bring in the best of your crops and win a prize!
(안함)If you're lucky, you might find yourself the grand prize winner!
(안함)How nice! You win a {0-reward}!
(안함)I've seen better...but it's not a bad specimen. Here's a {0-reward} for your efforts!
(안함)Hey, so want me to let you in on a little secret?
(안함)I've been so excited about this amazing new crop I discovered, but I haven't been able to get away...
(안함)I wanted to take part in the contest, not handle it!
(안함)But maybe you can do it for me instead? I just want to see the crop win!
(안함)If you plant these ^c:1486b0;seeds^c:pop;, I guarantee you'll get a crop that no one can beat!
(안함)You'll never have seen anything like it before!
(안함)Wow! Now that is one massive ^c:1486b0;turnip^c:pop;!
(안함)I don't think I've ever seen anything this impressive before in my life!
(안함)Whoever came up with this crop must have been a true genius, I'm sure!
(안함)That ^c:1486b0;voucher^c:pop; entitles you to the grand prize. No one is going to beat that!
(안함)Take it over to ^c:1486b0;{0-max}^c:pop;—he wanted to keep an eye on that one himself!
(안함)Hey there, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)How's it going down at the farm? Pretty good I hope?
(안함)You moving in there has been a little bit of a problem for me after all...
(안함)Oh, not that I mean to accuse you or anything...I was technically just squatting after all.
(안함)But it does mean I don't really have anywhere to live right now.
(안함)The ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop; is okay, but it does get a bit crowded with ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; around at night.
(안함)And I get the feeling ^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop; doesn't likely leaving me unattended in his establishment...
(안함)So what do you say? Feeling up to building me a house?
(안함)This ^c:d03e37;mailbox^c:pop; will designate the house as being mine once it's complete!
(안함)I hope I can count on you!
(안함)Still working on my house I hope?
(안함)Alternatively I can just move back in at your place? No?
(안함)Nice, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Very nice!
(안함)Now I won't have to sleep in the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop; with one eye open any more!
(안함)This is just a little reward to congratulate you on a job well done.
(안함)Thanks for all your help!
(안함)Hey, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, how's the farm?
(안함)I'm still trying to get properly settled in to my new home.
(안함)It's just...I think I'm too used to sleeping with all the farm memorabilia around...
(안함)It's surprisingly hard to fall asleep without them!
(안함)Maybe you could help me by tracking down some old bits and pieces around the island?
(안함)Just a few things that are very collectable, you know?
(안함)I'd settle for a ^c:d03e37;star jelly^c:pop;, a ^c:d03e37;fossilised slime^c:pop;, and a ^c:d03e37;paw shell^c:pop;.
(안함)Do you think you can manage that?
(안함)Nice! This is a really good start!
(안함)I hope you're all warmed up now because the next ones are going to be a bit tougher!
(안함)A long time ago, there was an ^c:d03e37;old tractor^c:pop; that got stuck in a ditch somewhere around here.
(안함)I think if you went mining a few ^c:d03e37;fossil rocks^c:pop; you might be able to come across some parts of it.
(안함)I think a ^c:d03e37;star jelly^c:pop;, a ^c:d03e37;fossilised slime^c:pop;, and a ^c:d03e37;paw shell^c:pop; would help me feel a bit more at home.
(안함)Think you can get all of those?
(안함)Oooh, yes! This is a wonderful piece of memorabilia!
(안함)While you were out digging that up, I remembered something else.
(안함)There were some ^c:d03e37;old tools^c:pop; the previous owner used to use a lot.
(안함)I think he lost some of them in one of the ^c:1486b0;lakes^c:pop;. Maybe you could fish them up?
(안함)Any luck find parts of that ^c:d03e37;old tractor^c:pop;?
(안함)I imagine you might be able to dig them up by mining a few ^c:d03e37;fossil rocks^c:pop;.
(안함)Yes, these are the ones I remember!
(안함)A bit rusty maybe, but they're definitely very collectable!
(안함)Now, there's just one last thing... It might be the most important thing too...
(안함)There's a limited-time online auction running for some really rare pieces of memorabilia...
(안함)Items that belonged to legendary farmers who changed the world!
(안함)The trouble is...they're a bit expensive...
(안함)Do you think you could put together ^c:d03e37;{0-currency}10,000,000^c:pop; over the next two days?
(안함)I understand if you can't, but still...
(안함)Did you manage to fish up any of the ^c:d03e37;old tools^c:pop;?
(안함)I know they fell into one of the ^c:1486b0;lakes^c:pop; around here.
(안함)There's still time left, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)You can still gather the money!
(안함)Well...it looks like we couldn't raise the money in time...
(안함)But...that's okay I suppose. I heard ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; was the one who actually won it...
(안함)So perhaps we could still try reasoning with him?
(안함)He wouldn't say anything about it?
(안함)Oh well...
(안함)I suppose I'll keep looking for other things...
(안함)Thanks for helping me out so far though!
(안함)Hi, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
(안함)I think ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; said he wanted to see you whenever you're free...
(안함)^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; told me to send you over if you came on by.
(안함)Hmm? ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;? My birthday?
(안함)Oh...I suppose that is coming up, isn't it?
(안함)You want to give everything to me now? Well I'm not about to say no!
(안함)Oh! I've been searching for a copy of this book for years! Where did you find it?
(안함)Oh oh! And is this that item ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; won on auction? He bought it for me?
(안함)You baked the ^c:d03e37;cake^c:pop;, you say? I'm sure it will be delicious!
(안함)Although...it looks like you didn't quite know what name to put on the cake...
(안함)Thank you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! People don't usually want to celebrate my birthday...
(안함)Could you pass on my thanks to ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; as well?
(안함)I think I want to keep admiring my presents...
(안함)Hi, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)I've been keeping an eye on your progress and it looks like you've really settled in.
(안함)This is a wonderful island, right? Do you think you're ready for the ultimate test?
(안함)At some point, everyone has to go through this to prove just how much they know about the island!
(안함)Before you arrived, I hid ^c:d03e37;13 bobbleheads^c:pop; around the village!
(안함)If you can find them all and show them to me, I'll acknowledge that you know the village like the back of your hand.
(안함)It doesn't matter what order you bring them in, just head out and find them!
(안함)He talked a lot about landscape and terrain, especially beaches.
(안함)Maybe he was a painter?
(안함)I'd love to get her to design me a furniture set someday!
(안함)Custom made is always the best!
(안함)Before I met this one, I was a little less sarcastic...
(안함)I wonder what that means?
(안함)I see him running around everywhere!
(안함)I think he puts out newsletters and things like that a lot too.
(안함)He's an artist! I think everyone in the village likes wearing his branded clothes.
(안함)If memory serves, he makes lots of really cool music!
(안함)Maybe we can get him to come play a live concert or something?
(안함)He's the one who makes everything around here work. Literally everything.
(안함)He works a lot with sounds. They really make games come alive!
(안함)He claims to exist only when you're not looking...
(안함)But I'm absolutely sure I've seen him around a few times...
(안함)Hmm...
(안함)Something about this ^c:d03e37;bobblehead^c:pop; seems missing...
(안함)I heard he invented the ^c:d03e37;sprinkler^c:pop;?
(안함)We could definitely use more of those around here!
(안함)He's the architect who built all the houses in the village!
(안함)Nothing has fallen down yet!
(안함)He does a lot of work in marketing!
(안함)Maybe he could help getting more visitors interested in our festivals?
(안함)Oh, you found another ^c:d03e37;bobblehead^c:pop;?
(안함)Let me see!
(안함)Ahh, I remember this one...
(안함)So I think that just leaves ^c:d03e37;{0-remainingBobbleheads} bobbleheads^c:pop; to go!
(안함)Oh, I think that's all of them!
(안함)Wow. I didn't think you'd actually manage to find them all!
(안함)Even I forgot where I put most of them...
(안함)I suppose that means you're the one who knows this village the best!
(안함)You've definitely come a long way since you first got here.
(안함)I still remember the day you arrived...showing you the ropes.
(안함)Who knew you'd surpass me this quickly?
(안함)I still remember the day you arrived...when you told me you were already a licensed farmer.
(안함)It was exciting to have another expert around!
(안함)If you're ever lonely on that farm, just know that I'd still love to live there!
(안함)You can ask me any time!
(안함){0-harvest0}
(안함){0-harvest1}
(안함)Leave
(안함){0-harvest0}
(안함)Leave
(안함){0-harvest0}
(안함){0-harvest1}
(안함){0-harvest2}
(안함)Leave
(안함){0-harvest0}
(안함){0-harvest1}
(안함){0-harvest2}
(안함){0-harvest3}
(안함)Leave
(안함)Leave
